page.title: 02POLICE AND CRIME - STRANRAER
page.content: Stranraer Police Establishments:- There are{28}Constables,{5}Sergeants, {1}Chief Inspector and{1}Superintendent There is a{Traffic Dept.}and { {Criminal Investigation Dept.}for more serious offences. { Port Security Dept.}which deals with Port Supervision and assists in prevention of{Terrorism.} The most common{crimes}in the area are housebreaking,theft and fraud. The most common{offences}are Breach of the Peace and Road Traffic Offences. In 1984,{3984}Crimes and Offences were made known to the Stranraer Police. Stranraer has a{District Court presided over by local J.P.'s, a{Sheriff Court}(with Jury for more serious Offences) and a{Children's {Panel. }The{High Court}for very serious offences does not sit in Stranraer.
